# startIndex

**Instance Property**

An index to the first joint transform in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: JointTransforms.Index { get }
```

## Discussion

For more on the sequence’s beginning index, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Array/startIndex].

## Inspecting joint transform details

- **endIndex**: An index to the last joint transform in the collection.
